trans-unit.source: Can be optionally applied to a workflow assembly.
trans-unit.target: 可以選擇性地套用至工作流程組件。

trans-unit.source: It defines a mapping between a common language runtime namespace that is defined in the current assembly and an XML namespace.
trans-unit.target: 它會定義目前組件中定義 common language runtime 命名空間和 XML 命名空間之間的對應。

trans-unit.source: This information is used in extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization/deserialization when activities or workflows that are defined in the assembly decorated with this attribute are used.
trans-unit.target: 使用活動或以這個屬性裝飾的組件中定義的工作流程時，這項資訊用於 extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 序列化/還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute"></xref> class, initializing <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.XmlNamespace*> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.ClrNamespace*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute"></xref>類別，初始化<> *> 和<> *> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the value for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.XmlNamespace*>.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the value for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.ClrNamespace*>.
clrNamespace is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: clrNamespace為 null 參考 ()。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.String> that represents the <xref:System.Type.Assembly*> name of the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.String>表示<xref:System.Type.Assembly*>裝飾類別的名稱。</xref:System.Type.Assembly*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the <xref:System.Type.Assembly*> name of the decorated class.
Gets a <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the CLR namespace of the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.String>表示裝飾類別的 CLR 命名空間名稱</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the CLR namespace of the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>表示裝飾類別的 CLR 命名空間名稱</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the XML namespace of the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.String>表示裝飾類別的 XML 命名空間名稱</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the XML namespace of the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>表示裝飾類別的 XML 命名空間名稱</xref:System.String>
